TEXT.S: Bob Allen nalecuhan i Amilika, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Bob Allen i 1968 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 6 ku uwac atu silsil 71, namapili' tu nu San Francisco Warriors putiput. 7 bulad 17 demiad, 1946 a mihca, Bob Allen, miunduay.
